articles.description: Wild card entrant VJ Archana beat Maya Krishnan, Manichandra, Vishnu and Dinesh to lift Bigg Boss Tamil Season 7 trophy. She follows Bigg Boss OTT 2 winner Elvish Yadav's path who was also a wild card contestant.
